content: this minimalist and spacious bucket bag is the perfect addition to your summer wardrobe whether you re carrying beach day essentials market treasures or your next crochet work-in-progress this chic and simple bowl tote has the perfect roomy interior lightweight and easy to work up this classic and casual piece is a must make please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free at www lakesideloops com/auden **in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes ** written pattern in english us terms pictures video tutorial left hand pattern available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
